Module com.example.project
Package javafxUI

Class BankTellerController

java.lang.Object
javafxUI.BankTellerController
public class BankTellerController extends Object
This class is what controls all the actions for each button using the inputs given by the user in the GUI
Author:
Sumanth Rajkumar, Shantanu Jain

  • Constructor Details

    • BankTellerController

      public BankTellerController()

  • Method Details

    • selected

      void selected()
      This method corresponds to the radio buttons in the open/close tab of the GUI. Only when selecting the College Checking button, is the college campus radio buttons are supposed to be available. Only when selecting the Savings button, is the loyal customer checkbox supposed to be available.

    • validateFirstLastNames

      private boolean validateFirstLastNames(boolean isOpenClose, boolean forOpen, boolean forDeposit)
      This function is a helper that checks if the user's entered first and last name are valid
      Parameters:
      forOpen - - a boolean that is true if it's the case of opening an account
      forDeposit - - a boolean that is true for the case of depositing to an account
      isOpenClose - - a boolean that is true for the case of opening or closing an account
      Returns:
      - true if first name and last name are valid, false otherwise

    • validateAndParseDOB

      private Date validateAndParseDOB(boolean isOpenClose)
      This function is a helper that checks if the user's entered dob is in the future or not.
      Parameters:
      isOpenClose - - a boolean that is true for the case of opening or closing an account
      Returns:
      - date object if passes conditions, null if it doesn't

    • populateHolder

      private boolean populateHolder(boolean isOpenClose, boolean forOpen, boolean forDeposit, Account account)
      This function is a helper that populates the account object with the entered profile info in the GUI
      Parameters:
      forOpen - - a boolean that is true if it's the case of opening an account
      isOpenClose - - a boolean that is true for the case of opening or closing an account
      forDeposit - - a boolean that is true for the case of depositing to an account
      account - - account being populated
      Returns:
      - true if account object is successfully populated with holder info, false otherwise

    • populateHolderAndBalance

      private boolean populateHolderAndBalance(boolean isOpenClose, Account account, String errorMessage)
      This function is a helper that populates the account object with the entered profile info and initial deposit info from the GUI
      Parameters:
      account - - account being populated.
      isOpenClose - - a boolean that is true for the case of opening or closing an account
      errorMessage - - String that represents the error message to give at a certain exception
      Returns:
      - true if account object is successfully populated with holder and balance info, false otherwise

    • checkExistingAndOpenAccount

      private void checkExistingAndOpenAccount(Account newAccount)
      This function is a helper that checks if account exists or closed before opening an account.
      Parameters:
      newAccount - - account being opened.

    • open

      void open()
      This method corresponds to the open button in the GUI. Opens an account when button is clicked depending on the user's entered input.

    • caseCheckingForOpen

      private void caseCheckingForOpen()
      This function is used to open a Checking account.

    • caseCollegeCheckingForOpen

      private void caseCollegeCheckingForOpen()
      This function is used to open a College Checking account.

    • caseSavingsForOpen

      private void caseSavingsForOpen()
      This function is used to open a Savings account.

    • caseMoneyMarketForOpen

      private void caseMoneyMarketForOpen()
      This function is used to open a Money Market account.

    • close

      void close()
      This function corresponds to the close button in the GUI. Closes an account when button is clicked depending on the user's entered input.

    • closeExistingAccount

      private void closeExistingAccount(Account account)
      This function is a helper that checks if account exists or already closed before closing an account.
      Parameters:
      account - - account being closed

    • caseCheckingForClose

      private void caseCheckingForClose()
      This function is used to close a Checking account.

    • caseCollegeCheckingForClose

      private void caseCollegeCheckingForClose()
      This function is used to close a College Checking account.

    • caseSavingsForClose

      private void caseSavingsForClose()
      This function is used to close a Savings account.

    • caseMoneyMarketForClose

      private void caseMoneyMarketForClose()
      This function is used to close a Money Market account.

    • deposit

      void deposit()
      This function corresponds to the deposit button in the GUI. Deposits to an account when button is clicked depending on the user's entered input.

    • depositToAccount

      private void depositToAccount(Account account)
      This function is a helper that checks if account exists or closed before depositing an amount to an account.
      Parameters:
      account - - account being deposited to.

    • caseCollegeCheckingForDeposit

      private void caseCollegeCheckingForDeposit()
      This function is used to deposit to a College Checking account.

    • caseCheckingForDeposit

      private void caseCheckingForDeposit()
      This function is used to deposit to a Checking account.

    • caseSavingsForDeposit

      private void caseSavingsForDeposit()
      This function is used to deposit to a Savings account.

    • caseMoneyMarketForDeposit

      private void caseMoneyMarketForDeposit()
      This function is used to deposit to a Money Market account.

    • withdraw

      void withdraw()
      This function corresponds to the withdraw button in the GUI. Withdraws from an account when button is clicked depending on the user's entered input.

    • withDrawFromAccount

      private void withDrawFromAccount(Account account)
      This function is a helper that checks if account exists or closed and if the amount being withdrawn is sufficient before withdrawing an amount from an account.
      Parameters:
      account - - account being withdrawn.

    • caseCheckingForWithdraw

      private void caseCheckingForWithdraw()
      This function is used to withdraw an amount from a Checking account.

    • caseCollegeCheckingForWithdraw

      private void caseCollegeCheckingForWithdraw()
      This function is used to withdraw an amount from a College Checking account.

    • caseSavingsForWithdraw

      private void caseSavingsForWithdraw()
      This function is used to withdraw an amount from a Savings account.

    • caseMoneyMarketForWithdraw

      private void caseMoneyMarketForWithdraw()
      This function is used to withdraw an amount from a Money Market account.

    • print

      void print()
      This function corresponds to the print all accounts button in the GUI. Prints all the accounts in the database in the order they were added in when button is clicked.

    • printByAccountType

      void printByAccountType()
      This function corresponds to the print all accounts by types button in the GUI. Prints all the accounts in the database by their account type alphabetically when button is clicked.

    • printWithFeeAndInterest

      void printWithFeeAndInterest()
      This function corresponds to the calculate interest and fees button in the GUI. Prints all the accounts in the database with the calculated fees and interest rate when button is clicked.

    • updateBalance

      void updateBalance()
      This function corresponds to the apply interests and fees button in the GUI. Prints all the accounts in the database with the updated balance from the calculated fees, interest rate, deposits, withdrawals, and closures when button is clicked.
